programs.title: Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM)
programs.description: AngularJS, developed by Google, is a powerful JavaScript framework that simplifies the process of building dynamic web applications. Angular JS is particularly useful in application development, especially for implementing form validation and creating responsive single-page applications. AngularJS simplifies the development of web applications. One of the key architectural patterns that AngularJS follows is the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern. Understanding the MVC design pattern is crucial for developers to create structured and maintainable applications. In this blog, we will explore the MVC pattern in AngularJS, its components, advantages, and how to implement it in real-world applications...
